title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections 
indoor premises) 

31AB and 31AD) (Covid-19) (Operation of certain 
(Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) 
(Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
385 of 2021) is amended by the substitution, in paragraph (2), of “21st day of 
October 2021” for “ 9th day of October 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 October, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [512] 3

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) 
(Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) (Amendment) (No. [3]) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 385 of 2021) to provide that the regulations shall 
remain in operation until the 21st October 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [512]
